about_the_game:
★About Supporter Pack★


《Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi》 is currently undergoing a hot update. Although the process is slow, various files that everyone may like have been created during the development process.
If you like our game, you can purchase a support package to support the development work of the game, and the production team has also carefully prepared some small gifts for you.

★Content in the package★


■ 《Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi》 10+ original soundtracks

■ 20+ high-definition CG basic games, with several differences

■ 8+ exquisite MP4 dynamic wallpapers

■ Several cute dynamic stickers

■ Several congratulatory pictures supported by the painters

■ Endless thanks from the developers team

* The content of the support package will gradually expand with the updates of the game itself, and more new content will be added to the support package in the future

* After purchasing the Supporter Pack, you can find the content of the Supporter Pack in the 【DLC】 folder of the game's root directory~

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following content, which may not be suitable for workplace: 
· Common Mature Content like Nudity and sexual suggestion
· Description of physical contact between homosexuals
· Potential drug use related content
